I.name: Ki Barrier
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Shen''' manifests a {{as|Spirit Blade|buzzword}} that he can control with ''{{ai|Twilight Assault|Shen}}'' and ''{{ai|Spirit's Refuge|Shen}}''.

{{sbc|Passive:}} After completing an [[champion ability|ability's]] effects, '''Shen''' {{tip|shields}} himself for {{pp|50 to 101}} {{as|(+ 12% '''bonus''' health)}} for {{fd|2.5}} seconds. If the triggering ability successfully affected at least one enemy {{tip|champion}}, ''Ki Barrier's'' cooldown is {{sti|cdr|reduced}} by {{pp|4;4.5;5;5.5;6;6.5;7;7.5|1;6;9;12;14;16;17;18}} seconds.
I.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Shen manifests a Spirit Blade that he can control with Shen's Twilight Assault and Shen's Spirit's Refuge.
Passive: After completing an champion ability effects, Shen shields himself for 50 − 101 (based on level) (+ 12% bonus health) for 2.5 seconds. If the triggering ability successfully affected at least one enemy champion, Ki Barrier's cooldown is reduced by 1;6;9;12;14;16;17;18 ‒ undefined seconds.
I.notes:
* The {{as|Spirit Blade|buzzword}} spawns with '''Shen''', teleports closer to him if he gets too far away, and instantly blinks to him if he uses any global {{tip|blink}} ({{si|Teleport}}, {{si|Recall}}, or {{ai|Stand United|Shen}}). It will also dissappear if '''Shen''' dies and reappear upon [[death|respawning]].
* Enemies see an arrow pointing from '''Shen''' to the location of his {{as|Spirit Blade|buzzword}} even if it is not visible.
* {{ai|Twilight Assault|Shen}} will grant the shield if the {{as|Spirit Blade|buzzword}} reaches '''Shen'''. If it is stopped, no shield is granted.
* {{ai|Spirit's Refuge|Shen}} will give the shield after the protective zone disappears.
* {{ai|Shadow Dash|Shen}} will give the shield when the dash ends.
** If the dash is {{tip|interrupt|interrupted}}, the shield will instead be received the moment the {{tip|crowd control}} source is applied, before damage calculation (if any).

Q1.name: Twilight Assault
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Shen''' recalls his {{as|Spirit Blade|buzzword}} to his location. Enemy champions hit are {{tip|slow|slowed}} for the next 2 seconds while moving away from '''Shen'''.
Once it arrives, '''Shen''' empowers his next 3 [[basic attack]]s within 8 seconds to gain {{sti|range|75 '''bonus''' range}} and deal {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}.

If the {{as|Spirit Blade|buzzword}} hit at least one enemy {{tip|champion}} during the travel, the empowerment is enhanced to deal increased {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} and additionally grant '''Shen''' {{sti|as|{{as|50% '''bonus''' attack speed}}}}.
Empowered attacks against {{tip|monsters}} deal 100% '''bonus''' damage, but their '''total''' damage is capped.
Q1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Shen recalls his Spirit Blade to his location. Enemy champions hit are slowed for the next 2 seconds while moving away from Shen.
Once it arrives, Shen empowers his next 3 basic attacks within 8 seconds to gain 75 bonus range and deal bonus magic damage.
If the Spirit Blade hit at least one enemy champion during the travel, the empowerment is enhanced to deal increased bonus magic damage and additionally grant Shen 50% bonus attack speed.
Empowered attacks against monsters deal 100% bonus damage, but their total damage is capped.
leveling: {{st|Bonus Magic Damage|{{pp|10 to 40 for 6|1 to 16}} {{as|(+ {{ap|2 to 4}}% {{as|(+ {{fd|1.5}}% per 100 AP)}} of target's '''maximum''' health)|health}}|Total Damage|{{pp|10*3 to 40*3 for 6|1 to 16}} {{as|(+ {{ap|2*3 to 4*3}}% {{as|(+ {{fd|4.5}}% per 100 AP)}} of target's '''maximum''' health)|health}}}}

{{st|Increased Bonus Damage|{{pp|10 to 40 for 6|1 to 16}} {{as|(+ {{ap|4 to 6}}% {{as|(+ 2% per 100 AP)}} of target's '''maximum''' health)|health}}|Total Increased Damage|{{pp|10*3 to 40*3 for 6|1 to 16}} {{as|(+ {{ap|4*3 to 6*3}}% {{as|(+ 6% per 100 AP)}} of target's '''maximum''' health)|health}}}}
Q1.notes:
* The {{as|Spirit Blade|buzzword}} will stop in place upon colliding with {{ai|Wind Wall|Yasuo}} or {{ai|Unbreakable|Braum}}. If this occurs, '''Shen''' will not receive the empowered attacks.
* When it is called, the {{as|Spirit Blade|buzzword}} also checks for units which's {{tip|gameplay radius}} it overlaps which (equal to a {{tip|er|icononly = true}} 0 radius check) before flying off, allowing it to hit enemies whose center is behind the missile origin.
* The empowered attack will not trigger against [[structures]] nor [[ward]]s.

effects.str:
• Bonus Magic Damage: 1 to 16 ‒ undefined (+ % (+ 1.5% per 100 AP) of target's maximum health)
  • Total Damage: 1 to 16 ‒ undefined (+ % (+ 4.5% per 100 AP) of target's maximum health)

1 to 16 ‒ undefined (+ % (+ 4.5% per 100 AP) of target's maximum health)

  • Total Increased Damage: 1 to 16 ‒ undefined (+ % (+ 6% per 100 AP) of target's maximum health)

W.name: Spirit's Refuge
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Shen''' primes his {{as|Spirit Blade|buzzword}}, creating an area around it. After 2 seconds, or when '''Shen''' or an allied champion enter the area, the {{as|Spirit Blade|buzzword}} erupts a protective zone for {{fd|1.75}} seconds, {{tip|block|blocking}} all non-{{tip|turret}} [[basic attack]]s that hit '''Shen''' or allied champions in the area.
W.descriptionHtml: Active: Shen primes his Spirit Blade, creating an area around it. After 2 seconds, or when Shen or an allied champion enter the area, the Spirit Blade erupts a protective zone for 1.75 seconds, blocking all non-turret basic attacks that hit Shen or allied champions in the area.
W.notes:
* ''Spirit's Refuge's'' protective zone can be moved while active if '''Shen''' uses {{ai|Twilight Assault|Shen}}.
* ''Spirit's Refuge'' cannot be ranked up at [[Experience (champion)|Level]] 1.
* ''Spirit's Refuge'' will also block damage from all abilities that use {{tip|basic damage}} ({{ai|Lunge|Fiora}}, {{ai|Mystic Shot|Ezreal}}, {{ai|Steel Tempest|Yasuo}}).

E.name: Shadow Dash
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} Dealing damage with ''{{ai|Twilight Assault|Shen}}'' or ''Shadow Dash'' restores {{sti|energy|{{as|{{pp|30 to 40 for 3|1;4;12}} energy}}}}.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Shen''' {{tip|dashes}} to the target location, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to enemy {{tip|champions}} and {{tip|monsters}} he passes through and {{tip|taunt|taunting}} them for {{fd|1.5}} seconds.
''{{ai|Twilight Assault|Shen}} and {{ai|Spirit's Refuge|Shen}} can be cast during the dash. Shadow Dash will cast at max range if cast beyond that.''
E.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Dealing damage with Shen's Twilight Assault or Shadow Dash restores 1;4;12 ‒ undefined energy.
Active: Shen dashes to the target location, dealing physical damage to enemy champions and monsters he passes through and taunting them for 1.5 seconds.
Shen's Twilight Assault and Shen's Spirit's Refuge can be cast during the dash. Shadow Dash will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
E.notes:
* Casting {{si|Flash}} during ''Shadow Dash'' will end the dash prematurely, but the end-of-dash collision check will hit enemies at the [[blink|blink's]] location still.
** This still cannot affect the same enemy more than once.
* The energy restore from ''Shadow Dash'' may only occur once.

R1.name: Stand United
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Shen''' {{ccib|Stand United Minimap.png}} {{tip|channel|channels|noimg=true}} for 3 seconds, {{tip|shield|shielding}} the target allied champion at the time of cast for up to 5 seconds, increased by {{as|{{pp|type=target's '''missing''' health|key=%|0 to 60 for 7|key1=%|0 to 60|formula=1% per 1% of target's '''missing''' health. ''This is capped at 60% '''missing''' health.''}}|health}}.

Upon completing the channel, '''Shen''' and his {{as|Spirit Blade|buzzword}} {{tip|blink}} to the target ally's location, placed between them and the nearest enemy champion. '''Shen''' also {{tip|homing projectile destruction|destroys}} any {{tip|projectiles}} targeting him at the time of completion.
R1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Shen Unknown value: ccib / Stand United Minimap.png channels for 3 seconds, shielding the target allied champion at the time of cast for up to 5 seconds, increased by 0 to 60 ‒ undefined.
Upon completing the channel, Shen and his Spirit Blade blink to the target ally's location, placed between them and the nearest enemy champion. Shen also destroys any projectiles targeting him at the time of completion.
leveling: {{st|Minimum Shield|{{ap|130 to 450}} {{as|(+ 135% AP)}} {{as|(+ 16% of his '''bonus''' health)}}|Maximum Shield|{{ap|130*1.6 to 450*1.6}} {{as|(+ 216% AP)}} {{as|(+ {{fd|25.6}}% of his '''bonus''' health)}}}}
R1.notes:
* ''Stand United'' can target allies via the [[Map (League of Legends)|mini map]] or on their portraits or by using the {{sbc|F2 - F5}} keys (none of this can be done if '''Shen''' is affected by {{tip|nearsight}} or his target is {{tip|untargetable}}).
* '''Shen''' will turn to face towards his target ally at the start of the channel.
** If the target is {{tip|stealth|stealthed}}, enemies could, in theory, use this to estimate their location.
* '''Shen''' will channel so long as his target is alive (even if the granted shield is broken). If his target dies, the channel is canceled and ''Stand United'' goes on full cooldown.
** {{tip|Interrupt|Interrupting}} ''Stand United's'' channel will not remove the shield prematurely.
* The target's screen will glow purple to telegraph that '''Shen''' has targeted them with ''Stand United''.
** It will change back when the channel ends.
* The following table refers for interactions while '''Shen''' is {{tip|channel|channeling}}:
{{ct|channel|attack=false|move=false|consume=false|cast=false|items=false|spells=false|interrupts=death, ground, root, silence}}

effects.str:
• Minimum Shield: (+ 135% AP) (+ 16% of his bonus health)
  • Maximum Shield: (+ 216% AP) (+ 25.6% of his bonus health)

st_slices: (+ 135% AP) (+ 16% of his bonus health)
(+ 216% AP) (+ 25.6% of his bonus health)
